item.name: Energy Cell
item.text: The ammunition of a firearm is destroyed upon use. Futuristic firearms are powered by a special type of ammunition called energy cells. An energy cell contains enough power for all the shots its firearm can make.

item.name: Antimatter Rifle
item.text: An antimatter rifle is a futuristic firearm that inflicts necrotic damage.
Reload (2 Shots): A limited number of shots can be made with a weapon that has the reload property. A character must then reload it using an action or a bonus action (the character's choice).

item.name: Laser Pistol
item.text: A laser pistol is a futuristic firearm that inflicts radiant damage.
Reload (50 Shots): A limited number of shots can be made with a weapon that has the reload property. A character must then reload it using an action or a bonus action (the character's choice).
